title: Savage Outlaw
description: HOW DO YOU GET OVER AN UNFORGETTABLE LOVE? The Butcher has always had savage emotions tangled up in Roux Tucker. Their history is anything but sweet. It’s been a blazing obsession for years. Never allowing the other to move on. He almost died because of her. And he never regretted it. OUTLAW RULES DECREE THEY CAN’T BE TOGETHER. She’s the princess to a rival MC. The pull is two magnets fighting to find the other.An engagement. An enemy Prez who hates him. A murder thrown into the mix. Obstacles stack up one after the other. The Butcher will go through them all to finally claim his woman. Roux is a hellcat to be reckoned with and he’s more than ready to take her claws. Trouble always comes for the Renegade Souls. He’s a healer not a fighter but he’d break the world if it gets in his way. He’s a one woman kind of biker and it’s time she embraced their forbidden loveButcher is a savage, he’ll stop at nothing. Read in order to better appreciate the ongoing background story lines...or jump right in if you don’t mind missing out on the world building back stories and character development♥
author: V. Theia
